text:
Sergei Makarovich Kramarenko (; 10 April 1923 – 21 May 2020) was a Soviet Air Force officer. He fought in World War II and the Korean War. He was honored withHero of the Soviet Union. He retired in 1977 with the rank of major-general. He was the last living Soviet flying ace of Korean War.
Kramarenko died on 21 May 2020, aged 97.
